title: Bolshoy Ashap
text: The Bolshoy Ashap () is a river in <a href="Perm%20Krai">Perm Krai</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, a left tributary of <a href="Iren%20%28river%29">Iren</a> which in turn is a tributary of <a href="Sylva%20%28river%29">Sylva</a>. The river is long. Main tributaries: <a href="Bolshaya%20Rassokha">Bolshaya Rassokha</a> (right).
